title: How to start understanding concepts - Quora

response.answer_text: You try to enjoy yourself. Instead of seeing them as an impossible chore, see them as an exciting puzzle. A lot of students don't recognize the beauty in manipulating numbers and immersing yourself in a scientific concept. My barrier in mathematics was quite simply rejecting maths and refusing to try to enjoy it. Once I did start to enjoy it, well, I was far more successful. P.S I've always enjoyed Science for one reason. I want to understand the how's and why's of our universe. You should try so to.
